thread.section_title: MotoCMS Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MotoCMS | motocms.com
thread.title: happy$sailor

author: happy$sailor
title: happy$sailor
text: Operator Jay was extremely helpful! He solved all my problems! I spent so much time looking for answers in web, was about to give up to do my own site with the domain that was already registered! He explained all the details, offered great solutions that suits us very much! Was so patient and kind! Offered to copy the instructions and send me to email. He provided very detailed, acurate and useful information. We are very happy with such service! You really do work, guys! Thank you so much! Best rates!!
